column1: Kata Robata////Then we had more sake and assorted kind of sushi ( salmon
column4: and hamachi) and the caribbean roll. OMG! the toro was fantastic !!!!!!!! After the first one
column5: we ordered more bc it was so fresh and it totally melted inside my mouth
column6: but I was kinda disappointed at the kobe beef one. and the caribbean roll was pretty decent too !
